proposal: Understanding UOST's vision of revolutionizing the global internet shopping experience with a reliable digital currency, we see a world where your token not only facilitates payments but also creates a vibrant community ecosystem. Congrats on reaching 66 holders in the ETH network! Imagine integrating our DEX and Lottery tools, where anyone in your community can deploy and share revenue, making UOST not just a currency but a community-driven platform. Let's make internet shopping not just easy but also rewarding.
